title: Prose Poem Description for the Preparation of the "Winter Light and Shadow" Photography Exhibition
description:
Please translate the following Chinese text into English, strictly adhering to the requirements below:

We need to write prose-poem style captions for the exhibited "Winter Scenes of Cuihu Lake" photo series. Conceptual direction: a tranquil, hazy Eastern aesthetic. You may draw inspiration from last week's note "Pavilions Like Boats" to develop the theme, depicting the ethereal quality of architecture in the morning mist. Complete the first draft within this week.

Translation Requirements:
1. Semantic Accuracy: Fully preserve all information and meaning of the original text.
2. Consistent Style: Maintain the original text's level of formality and professional quality.
3. Standardized Terminology: Ensure proper and consistent translation of professional terms, names of people, places, and other proper nouns.
4. Strict Format: Output only the translated English text, without adding any explanations, notes, or formatting marks.
summarized_info: Sun Yuwei created a preparatory task for the 'Winter Light and Shadow' photography exhibition, mentioning the need to incorporate the previously noted inspiration 'Pavilions Like Boats' to write the photo captions.

The plan is to be carried out every Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday afternoon. Initial execution date: March 16, 2025.
